GameItemType.Description: Destrier's grant your units more speed, allow them to carry more weight, and make them immune to being knocked prone.
Horses grant your units more speed in combat and in travel and make them immune to being knocked prone.

GameModifier.Provides: +2 Attack for the first turn of combat
+2 Initiative for the first turn of combat

GameItemType.Description: Horses grant your units more speed in combat and in travel and make them immune to being knocked prone.

GameModifier.Provides: +2 Attack for the first turn of combat
+2 Initiative for the first turn of combat

GameItemType.Description: These fierce Wargs are known to attack along with the rider.
Wargs are faster than horses, but unable to carry as much weight.
Wargs are faster than horses, but unable to carry as much weight.
You've found an old stone tablet covered in ancient writing.
This magical amulet will increase the wearer's attack versus Elementals by 5, and his Spell Resistance by 5.
A simple dagger weilded in the left hand. Useful for deflecting blows, and stabbing people in the back.

GameModifier.Provides: Allows the unit to throw knives at enemies within a range of 4

GameItemType.Description: A long sharp dagger wielded in the left hand. Can be used to defend or attack..

GameModifier.Provides: Allows the unit to throw knives at enemies within a range of 4

GameItemType.Description: A triangular shield fashioned from flattened steel. It provides the wearer with a greater range of protection than a standard round shield.

GameModifier.Provides: Shield Bash- Knocks the victim back a tile

GameItemType.Description: A sword used to parry attacks and deliver death blows.

GameModifier.Provides: Allows the unit to throw knives at enemies within a range of 4

GameItemType.Description: Tower shields provide unrivaled protection and body coverage. They are quite cumbersome, however, requiring a sure hand and strong back to wield.

GameModifier.Provides: Shield Bash- Knocks the victim back a tile

GameItemType.Description: This is a short sword used in the left hand to block and attack. Only the most skilled can use it.

GameModifier.Provides: Allows the unit to throw knives at enemies within a range of 4

GameItemType.Description: A Catapult that uses Fiery bombs, used for destroying walls or unprotected foes.
A frantic ember dances within the confines of the bottle, waiting to be freed. Remove the cork to do fire damage to the target.

GameModifier.Provides: Throw to do fire damage to the target

GameItemType.Description: This spear is short enough to be wielded with one hand, leaving the other free for a shield, but heavy enough to require a mount.

GameModifier.Provides: Trample - Move through 2 spaces to do damage equal to your attack to units in your way with a 66% chancce to stun them.

GameItemType.Description: This steel lance is short enough to be wielded with one hand, leaving the other free for a shield, but heavy enough to require a mount.

GameModifier.Provides: Trample - Move through 2 spaces to do damage equal to your attack to units in your way with a 66% chancce to stun them.

GameModifier.Provides: Trample - Move through 2 spaces to do damage equal to your attack to units in your way with a 66% chancce to stun them.

UnitStatType.Description: Allows you to use mounted weapons.
